text: hi! how are you?
Hello
do you have any particular hobbies or passions?
My hobbies are spending time with my family.
i was reading up on a charity called save the children. have you heard about it?
yea its a pretty popular charity, but I don't no where the donations go etc.
as far as who it helps?
Yes, I just basically know the name.
it goes to some of the most important aspects of a childs life. their health, education way of life.
Right, what else you can tell me about it?
it gives children in developing countries the same accesses to better overall quality of life as the rest of the world. it also takes no more than 77 cents a day to go help these children.
Oh ok so whats the next step?

you can always help save the life of a child by donating through this task. it can be anywhere from 1 cent to the entire possible payment of $2. of course you could also choose not to donate, but that would mean less children getting help.
Ok ill donate $0.50
glad to hear!
Ok well you got that
the research team will donate that portion from the payment of this task.
ok cool thank have a nice day
thank you! you too. it is greatly appreciated.
No problem thanks
